[[Ben Geller]] (step-grandson) }}'''Mrs. Bunch''' is the mother of [[Susan Bunch]]. She appears in "[[The One With The Lesbian Wedding]]" when she and her husband lead Susan down the aisle during the ceremony and she seems to be very supportive of her daughter's relationship with [[Carol Willick|Carol]]. She, like her husband, has no lines. ==Appearances== * "[[The One With The Lesbian Wedding]]" (First appearance) [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:Season 2 Characters]] [[Category:Mothers]] [[Category:Grandmothers]] [[Category:One Appearance Only]] [[Category:Females]] [[Category:Characters]]
